p:
Recommendation LCS resources.
ResourceTypeDescription
Recommendation LCS - Plan DefinitionPlanDefinitionEvent-Condition-Action rule that implements behavior for USPSTF's Lung Cancer Screening Guideline Recommendation
LCS Recommendation LibraryLibraryCQL Library that provides logic for lung cancer screening.
The LCS Recommendation implementation depends on the following common libraries.
ResourceTypeDescription
FHIR HelpersLibraryCQL Library that provides common logic for modeling FHIR R4.
FHIR Common FunctionsLibraryCQL Library that provides common global logic.
